page.title: 12Children's lives.
page.content: Claire Lugar is 8. She lives in a pub in Amroth. She says, "I help at home and I go to Brownies where we play games. I like Super Gran on I.T.V. I live near the seaside and it is very quiet in the winter but very busy in the summer months. My favourite sweet is candy floss". Sophie Turpin likes chips and reading. Alexandra lives on a farm. In the mornings she helps to feed the geese and the cows. Carol Neale waits for the 'bus to go to school in a 'bus shelter. She says that she works hard in school and in the netball team practice. Caroline Murphy's dad is the manager of the Post Office in Kilgetty. Her favourite food is curry. Louise Jenkins' dad plays darts, football and cricket for the Sports Club in Kilgetty. She goes to Brownies every Tuesday evening. She has to pay 20p subs.
